settings.question: How do I find out when new styles are releasing and when?
settings.answer: Your best bet is to sign up for our newsletter or by following us on social media, you'll be first to know about new styles and promotions.

settings.question: An item I want is sold out. When will it become available again?
settings.answer:
If an item is listed as sold out, it is unavailable for purchase. You can click the ‘size sold out?’ link on the product page and sign up to receive restock notifications.

You can also reach out to us at support@pudgypenguins.io for more information.

settings.question: How can I check the balance on my gift card?
settings.answer: If you would like to check the balance on your gift card, email us at support@pudgypenguins.io

settings.question: What if I need to modify my order?
settings.answer: If you would like to modify your order and it has not been processed, please email support@pudgypenguins.io. Once your order has been prepped for shipping, it cannot be modified.

settings.question: Where is my order?
settings.answer:
Domestic delivery times can take up to 5-7 business days or longer depending on location.

If after 7 days your package still has yet to arrive, please email us at support@pudgypenguins.io with your order number and details.

settings.question: What currencies are supported?
settings.answer: All available currencies are listed in the drop-down menu under the flag icon. The flag icon can found in the header at the top right off the screen.

settings.question: Are duties and taxes included at checkout?
settings.answer: Unfortunately international orders may be subject to customs fees/delays, which we have no control over.

settings.question: How do I track my international order?
settings.answer: International orders can be tracked on your Order Page, or email us at support@pudgypenguins.io

settings.question: Where is my order?
settings.answer:
International delivery times typically take 14-25 business days, but can be longer depending on location.

If after 14-25 days your package still has yet to arrive, please email us at support@pudgypenguins.io with your order number and details. 

International orders may be subject to customs delays/fees, which we have no control over.

settings.copy: Find answers to our most frequently asked questions below. If you can't find what you're looking for please contact us and we'll get in touch with 24 hours.
